notes: Jan-Mar 2026 premiums: R1,681 for all members
Flat pricing across all member types

network_hospitals: Private hospitals in the Dynamic Smart hospital network
exclusions: Skin disorders including benign growths and lipomas
Elective caesarean section (except if medically necessary)
Back and neck treatment or surgery
Cochlear implants and auditory brain implants
notes: If you do not use a network hospital, you may have to pay a portion of the account.
Certain in-hospital procedures are not covered (see exclusions).

procedures.notes: Dynamic Smart Day Surgery Network required. Out-of-network upfront payment of R15,300.
procedures.marketing_description: On Essential Dynamic Smart, Gastroscopies must be done in the Dynamic Smart Day Surgery Network to avoid a R15,300 upfront payment.

jargon_busters.definition: The specific list of day clinics you must use for this plan to avoid extra costs.

faqs.question: Can I go to any hospital?
faqs.answer: No, you must use the Dynamic Smart Day Surgery Network facilities.

preparation: Fast for at least 6 hours before the procedure.
procedures.recovery_time: 1-2 hours observation, no driving for 24 hours.

procedures.notes: Dynamic Smart Day Surgery Network required. Out-of-network upfront payment of R15,300.
procedures.marketing_description: Colonoscopies require use of the Dynamic Smart Day Surgery Network. Using an out-of-network provider triggers a R15,300 upfront fee.

modules.title: Personal Health Fund
modules.description: Day-to-day healthcare benefit with accumulation based on Personal Health Pathway.

data.notes: Up to R14,000 maximum per family.

data.pmb_cover: Full cover for PMB cancer treatment
